article_title: Dark horse U.S. Senate candidate Dirk Adams says he has experience to get job done

og.description: HELENA – When you ask Wilsall rancher/attorney and U.S. Senate candidate Dirk Adams why he’s a Democrat, he says it’s because he is conservative.
